website_summaries.verdict: Classic-look slip-on for casual/social outings by well-known manufacturer with reputation for quality.
pros: Comfortably padded collar and footbed for exceptional shock absorption
Slim profile rubber sole for greater flexibility
Signature Vans waffle tread for excellent grip
cons: More for casual/social wear than athletic activity

customer_reviews.title: Not authorized seller?
customer_reviews.text: The package delivered had two right sneakers and the outside was unmarked. These may not be authentic sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: HJB

customer_reviews.title: Really cute shoes that go with everything
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these shoes for her birthday and she loves them. She wears a size 8 and these fit exactly true to size. They go with everything and are easy to throw in the wash. She wears them constantly and they are holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Because I love how these look and I wanted them to stay ...
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is not putting waterproofing/stain resistant product on before spilling Dr Pepper on them! Because I love how these look and I wanted them to stay white. Haven't tried washing them yet- hoping that will help. Be warned that the material will collect every speck of dust unless you product protect it!
customer_reviews.author: mjbaz

customer_reviews.title: Marginal workmanship, knock off?????
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my son in June, size 12, about 2 months ago I noticed the side of each shoe is separating from the sole, where the little toe is. So he got about 4 months of service from theme. I am buying 2 more pair direct from Vans so if the rip, I can send them back. I am also buying in a larger size..
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Blisters =/
customer_reviews.text: All my 9 sized shoes fit me perfectly but this 9 sized shoe was a little bit small to me, so I am having some blisters on my heal
customer_reviews.author: Nuno Boggiss

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vans!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Vans since I could walk and I'm 42 now! Everyone's different but they fit me perfect and have been true to size every time. The classic style will never get old (to me anyway) and I will continue to wear my Vans until the day I take that long dirt nap.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality control on order fulfillment and item picture
customer_reviews.text: Checking back on my order the picture showed a leather basket weave like pattern... The shoes I received were standard canvas ones. This is actually what I wanted all along but was ok with the other (leather weave) as they fit the need at the time. 5 stars for the shoes as they fit right and have the standard Vans identifiers. 2 stars on quality control of listing vs what was received. If I could give 3.5 stars as the average I would but Alas I cannot, so 3 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: caroline Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice very well made, I ordered these for my grandson and the best part is they had his size, looked everywhere in different stores for these but no one had his size, I'm so glad I found them from this seller and they were delivered extremely early so happy with my purchase from this seller. I definitely will be ordering from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: they came a day earlier than expected, and the shoe is overall really nice. It matches with anything and they're also comfy :) it's true to size too
customer_reviews.author: Justine!

customer_reviews.title: Vans for Life
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Vans since 1979. I bought my neice her 1st pair when she was 6 months old and this pair is for her Junior Prom! Vans haven't changed much in the last 30 or so years, classic and dependable!
customer_reviews.author: philip newton

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased Vans for years... never on amazon though. This pair of shoes, while appearing to be official Vans, was the worst quality product. These must not be official Vans - yet are priced just as expensive as the originals. Within a few weeks, already they have holes in the canvas - both shoes, same spot. In all our years purchasing Vans, we have never had this problem. This happened just outside of the amazon return period, so I am not able to return the product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: vitabella603

customer_reviews.title: Love love love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the shoes! I accidentally ordered the wrong size but it'll be ok. I added a photo to show how much room I had considering my mistake! They got here earlier than expected which is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh Busby

customer_reviews.title: Different Vans Logo
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is basically what you expect it to be. Fits true to size and slides in fine. My only big problem with it and is that it came with two different Vans logos in the back! I don't know what happened but I'm definitely knocking two stars for that. It makes the shoes look a bit off but it's not worth returning them and waiting more time. I would say to double check your order before you start wearing these
customer_reviews.author: Nox

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell that I was ordering men's shoes rather than women's
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looked like good quality for the brief moment that I had them before sending them back. I did a search on Amazon for ladies' shoes and what I had ordered previously displayed. I had ordered a size 9, which is what I wear in women's shoes. When they were shipped to me, they were a size 9 men's shoe/10.5 ladies. I went back online to see how I had messed up, and I didn't find anywhere that these were unisex shoes. I didn't know what the equal size of men's was to women's anyway. I guess I'll buy something other than Van's. That reinforces to me why it's always better to buy shoes in store rather than online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, stylish, but some sizing issues.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was just an issue with the wrong tag on the first order or if the shoes are severely oversized. We returned the first pair and the replacements fit nicely. These are the only shoes we have purchased for my teenage son for the past 4 or 5 years. He is very active and each pair lasts him about a year.
customer_reviews.author: James Burke

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap made .soles started separating from the canvas after being worn only a few times. When I wanted to return them 45 days later I was going to be charged $20 restock fee & $28 shipping . Not worth sending them back. Do not purchase vans.
customer_reviews.author: kim c.

customer_reviews.title: Big Wow
customer_reviews.text: At first I was afraid I was going to get knock-off, fake Vans. But nope! they were real and even came with the sticker and in the original box. They fit well and are honestly just a super classic look. After breaking them in, theyre going to be your favourite shoe because it's so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!!! The fits perfect! I usually wear and 8 to 81/2 so I got the 81/2. They are so comfortable and the color is so cute!!! Favorite shoes by far!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Great Man’s slipon shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these shoes in the past.I really like the way they feel on my feet.What I didn’t like was the price I think if I shopped around I could of found them cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Fink

customer_reviews.title: Snug and used
customer_reviews.text: First of all they were an unmatched pair, at least one was a return. How do I know? Because one was already dirty. Second, although they're cute and I really wanted a pair, both were a bit snug but one was actually too tight across the top. Needless to say, I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Wissh

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I waited my entire life to by Vans and I regret that wait! Had cheap knockoffs when I was a kit and they were just OK, but the real thing is worth the $$. I love these shoes as they are so comfortable and easy to slip on. I'm really lazy and can't be bothered to tie my shoes, so these are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gudat

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have two pair one black and one blue. They are well made and comfortable, I had to purchase 1/2 size up as they seem to run a little small. I travel and fly a lot and these are great airport/airplane shoes!
customer_reviews.author: SDAmazon

customer_reviews.title: My kids likes them
customer_reviews.text: While I personally think these are hideous, and they remind me of my grandpa's house shoes, my teenager really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Missie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several of these same shoes (alas if they were only puppy proof). They fit great. I tried some Lugs and those are good too and less expensive but don’t seem to fit me as well as Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All men's (and women's) are not created equal. Some feet are wider than others.
customer_reviews.text: What's up with Vans? No wider sizes for men or women? All he-men have dainty little narrow feet so that glass slipper will fit us? Come on, I had to custom order and pay over $30 extra and wait 3 weeks for the boat from China to get my wide sized slip on. RIDICULOUS. Mr. Van, get with the program and offer wider sizes at no extra cost and do it pronto, otherwise, competition, here we come.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Panther

customer_reviews.title: ... I know vans run small but they still feel like there two sizes small
customer_reviews.text: I bought one size larger because I know vans run small but they still feel like there two sizes small.. I love vans been wearing them my whole life but if you get these and have a wide foot I would order three sizes bigger then you foot size at least
customer_reviews.author: jason blinzley

customer_reviews.title: Hard, Flat soles, Durable with tight elastics
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this shoes for over 6 months and the shoe is intact without any damage. I've used it extensively like for playing badminton, gym training. The best part is that I was doubtful about the elastics which would loosen up after some use. But the shoe is perfect fit even after 6 months. The shoe is washable and could be cleaned with common shoe cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: sampath

customer_reviews.title: Vans: Unmatched
customer_reviews.text: These are Vans. These are very fine. They fit just right as long as I order the right size. The only annoying thing is styles/colors are limited. Is that the problem of the manufacturer, supplier or Amazon? We consumers just don't know.
customer_reviews.author: TWA

customer_reviews.title: but were not as comfortable as the same model I purchased locally
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but I purchased these shows from my local vans shop, same size different color, and the ones I ordered on here were a lot tighter. Still fit, but were not as comfortable as the same model I purchased locally.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Slip-on ease
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He loves the ease of being able to slip them on. States they are very comfortable. They were a little right at first until they stretched out and broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Staying true to form
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike retiring an old pair of Vans but at least I know the next pair I buy will be as good as the last pair. While the price has gone up and the availability gone waaay down its still worth it to me to seek out a pair of Vans. Want a five star review? Maybe offer a few more styles in my size or have a sale once every 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Bajeebers

customer_reviews.title: Wider than medium ; thin sole
customer_reviews.text: It’s too bad that Van doesn’t make different shows for men and women in this size. A man’s 9 is a lot wider than a woman’s 10 1/2. The sole is surprisingly thin. You feel everything you step on.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, washable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My go-to shoe - have purchased many times. Fits a little tight the first day or two then very comfortable day-after-day. I also toss mine in the laundry every so often to keep them clean. Daily use - lasts 4-5 months before they become “yard work shoes”
customer_reviews.author: RobertW

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with seller and purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. At first I received the wrong item but was able to contact seller and I received an immediate response and was able to ship the wrong ones back and receive the correct ones I order. I am very happy and will be ordering more in the future. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small around :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought the right size that I wear for any shoe which is a 9.5 in mens. They shoes are definitely in a womens size. They fit about 2 to 3 sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: JoshTP

customer_reviews.title: I don't like my feet to sweat too bad
customer_reviews.text: I find these shoes to be too hot for my feet. I've got the hot feet! Seriously, they aren't very airy. I don't like my feet to sweat too bad, but I do wear them to work, and take them off under the desk
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: For some reason they fit loose i have a black pair of these and there fit these pretty much are about to flop off definitely kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: She loves them !
customer_reviews.text: Vans have been around for over sixty years. Reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSu

customer_reviews.title: Vans forever
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Vans for years. I’m glad somethings are still as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who wears a 7.5 womens like I do and fit perfectly! She loves these. Just as pictured and what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: JessieJ8T

customer_reviews.title: My go-to shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are my go-to shoes. They match with almost everything, and are so comfortable. Despite wearing them almost everyday, and not being a very careful person, these shoes are still in pretty good shape, proving its durability. After ordering these, I now want more pairs in other prints/colors!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in November and 1 1/2 months later it is already falling apart. Very disappointed. I bought Vans because I was buying quality but I was let down. I now need to replace his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: vans classic slip on are my go to shoe
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when ordering things online, since you can't try them on. Most places want you to pay the return shipping, and that sucks. Fortunately we know people who have a shoe stretcher, since mine came a little small. Too tight to wear. U sed a shoe stretcher a few times, and voila! Would be a 5 rating, but they were too small. 11 is a half size bigger than my foot, and usually fits a tiny bit loose, so this was a surprise. I have been getting size 11 for 19 years.
customer_reviews.author: sticks

customer_reviews.title: A real steal at $50.00!
customer_reviews.text: What a find these were and after my wife shamed me out of trying them on in a teenager shop at the local mall. They will replace my Sperry Top Sider slip-ons the selection of which has really gotten thin. And a $50.00 - a real steal. Very comfortable. I am a fan and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pit of Vans and I love them! High quality materials live up to the Vans reputation.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hogge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son couldn't even get his toes in this and we did buy the right size...plus u have to pay to send it back=lame
customer_reviews.author: R. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Nice quality and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: RDNOK

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It’s so easy to slip on and looks great with almost everything. I can comfortably wear this shoe all day walking around the city. It did take a few days to break in the shoes. I ordered my normal size and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved them!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived early, just in time for Christmas, just what my niece wanted. Can't do better than that!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Vans fan for 30+ years
customer_reviews.text: I'v been wearing these shoes for years. I just ordered them for the fist time from Amazon. They are as exactly as I expected. I don't know how to answer the arch support question as that is up to the individual. The work great for me and they are awesome to wear while flying as they make taking shoes off and on in a hurry a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: The Carl

customer_reviews.title: after 2 months the glue starts to show up
customer_reviews.text: honestly, these snickers last long 3 months, same exact model when I bought it in the retail stores last long about 1.5 years
customer_reviews.author: arcioneo

customer_reviews.title: Size up for kids with wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who has wide feet. Ended up going a size up so they wouldn’t be too tight and they fit great. He normally wears size 6 so we ordered the 7. The are great quality and he wears them almost every day and they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Depelteau

customer_reviews.title: Gave me wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. Gave them her size but they gave me men size. Was going to send them back but they ended up fitting a family member. They love them though 🤷
customer_reviews.author: K Lynn

customer_reviews.title: True to fit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, Only thing that i have issue with is the arch support. Its a little off, but i can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dixit

customer_reviews.title: I love classic Vans!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! This style doesn’t offer much for support and they are still comfortable for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put on. Arrived on time. Have to ware no socks or thin ones
customer_reviews.author: Rainstorm

customer_reviews.title: Fabric faded.
customer_reviews.text: Love Vans, however, the fabric faded after 3 months (blue). Not sure why, except seller may have purchased salvaged shoes from a retail shop. I’ve replaced this same color pair right from Vans website. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: JuwelsB

customer_reviews.title: Easy for me to walk in them for hours and ...
customer_reviews.text: I sized down 1/2 size and they fit perfectly. I've bought these same shoes probably 15 times in my life and they never disapppoint. Easy for me to walk in them for hours and the Black (with white) goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeeepy

customer_reviews.title: but easily stretched out with bags of water in the freezer
customer_reviews.text: Little bit smaller than expectes, but easily stretched out with bags of water in the freezer. Once I did that, they're hella comfy. They go with everything and feel great on my swollen pregnant feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: the wife said these are the most comfortable shoes she as ever worn.. and that is good enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Verner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but wrong size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives them and put them on right away and went out. After a few minutes she was back because they were too tight. Since she wore them, I can’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color?!? Ugh
customer_reviews.text: It was the right box but wrong color. It’s fine I’ll wear them but i can’t believe this...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kigore

customer_reviews.title: Love these comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Women's size 7.5. Bought the Men's 6 D(M) and they fit perfectly. Super comfortable shoes. Love it so much that I bought another pair in white. Don't know what other people were talking about their shoes not fitting. I think they just don't know how to order the right shoe size since all of these sizes are in men's.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer and spring
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of Vans, but I had never worn their slip ons. These shoes are sleek and breathable, but I would recommend an insole to make them more comfortable, which is the case for all vans. Obviously if you get an insole then go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVEs these shoes, it’s her third pair in two years. I wash them in the washing machine to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Viscusi

customer_reviews.title: Second pair bigger than first
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I purchased and this pair are a quarter size bigger than the first pair. I don’t why. My feet move around when I walk. Not ideal for a slip on. Sorta let down.
customer_reviews.author: SFN

customer_reviews.title: They're Vans
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love!? I've bought 3 different pairs of this style in the last few months. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Waters

customer_reviews.title: Love my vans
customer_reviews.text: I didnt think you could go wrong with vans- I was right. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: B Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Vans are Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These Vans slip on shoes are perfect. Great brand and quality. Pricey but well made and they last!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight getting my foot in but that was very first time putting them on and I have wide flat feet. After walking around for about 2 hours, my feet were still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vans rock
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a good sneaker? These are some of the most comfortable sneakers that I have ever owned. They look great with something as simple as a pair of jeans, I have even worn them with a summer dress and they still looked great. Fit to size and can be worn all day with no trouble whatsoever. These are my go to shoes. Vans rock.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they just take awhile to break in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my vans!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as I expected. Will probably buy another pair. They fit perfectly and have that great brand new Vans smell! lol Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Scroll through the sizes all the way if there's a style you like.
customer_reviews.text: Been a long time since I owned a pair. The purchasing process was difficult finding my size in the style and color. At first my style was not available in my size so I settled for another style. The purchase went through them when I checked the style I wanted they had it and for less. Grrrr.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyWhiteside

customer_reviews.title: The 10 1/2 fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these comfortable shoes. He needed the 10 1/2 for proper size this time.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Grate

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Were for my Great Grandson and he loved them. They replaced ones that had worn out.
customer_reviews.author: CARY

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully you won’t have to return them
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! I bought these shoes for my daughter for Christmas. she needed a half size bigger so I returned it not realizing that I had to pay the shipping and a restocking fee on top of that. So if you do decide to buy the shoes make sure that you will not have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: son loved getting them and still wears them to date. it's been a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Angandja

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I already knew my size in Vans so I was just repurchasing but it's just like the ones I buy at the store so I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Pari S

customer_reviews.title: Love slip on Vans!
customer_reviews.text: I just love vans! Can never go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Evie V

customer_reviews.title: Awwesome Vans Tennis Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one of our neighbor boy's birthday. He absolutely loved them. They fit as expected and were quality like all Vans products.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: awesome style
customer_reviews.text: Not certain why but these came a size larger than I ordered (12 instead of 11) and they fit way to small. I gave them to a friend who wears a 10 1/2 and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice slip on!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Vans Slip on shoes! She says they’re very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie D.

customer_reviews.title: Just a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the. But, she didn't have to pay for them. A little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my fat feet
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I wear Authentics and/or Eras almost daily. I haven't had slip ons since I wore the checkered black and whites as a kid. Holy crap, the slip ons do not fit like either of the aforementioned shoes that I normally wear. I couldn't even get my feet into these. I can't give Vans a bad review, but I will say that these fit much smaller than other models.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: and the length is perfect but they are tight across the top
customer_reviews.text: Newer vans seem tighter than they used to be. I got one size up, and the length is perfect but they are tight across the top. I have a normal size/width foot. The shoes arrived quickly and were as specified.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable just as I remember
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. Fits true to size. Comfortable just as I remember. The right side shoe rubbed the back of my heel the first few times I wore them. but now it’s doesn’t rub anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ls r.

customer_reviews.title: I love these but they do run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they do run a bit small; I have small feet and fat ones lol. So they are a bit tight but I still love them I'm trying to see if they will start stretching
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the shoes, just giving a low rating because of how EXPENSIVE it is. Save yourself some money and just buy off of the Vans or Journey website
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute and fit great, although they did require a bit of a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and fit great, although they did require a bit of a breaking-in period, but I've found that to be the case with this style of Vans in the past, so I expected it. Get a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves them!!!!.....
customer_reviews.text: it's not what I like that counts!!!.... the Grandson like's the shoe!!!!!....
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Had a pair of vans for 5 years, decided ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of vans for 5 years, decided to replace them with these, same style just a different design on the fabric or so I thought, these fit completely differently and always hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Vans have great style
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is well constructed and length wise fine but the top of the shoe presses the top of the foot so I prefer the tie on style more. I love Vans though nice shoes!
customer_reviews.author: mssusieq

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut the elastic to fit my fat foot in but I like them
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Owers

customer_reviews.title: What the kids are all wearing
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my niece wanted.... who knew what was in vogue 30 years ago is the cat's meow now, too???
customer_reviews.author: Ardent Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. They are authentic and fit as expected. She is an 8 in womens street shoes and we ordered a mens 6.5/womens 8. They come in the classic Vans box and come with the Vans sticker too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again if needed
customer_reviews.text: This product is for everyday wear and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michele culligan

customer_reviews.title: Probably stolen merch
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure these were stolen because they came with the theft proof wire and ink cartridge. We managed to work it out with some wire cutters, so no loss. I'm just glad that they're not fakes. I would definitely just go to the Van's website next time, as they're the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Fahn Egnash

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GET A SIZE UP
customer_reviews.text: They are authentic Vans but I am very disappointed!! This is my second time purchasing this shoe because everyone was saying to get a size up because they are tight shoes..... DO NOT get a size up!!!! I am ALWAYS a size 8.5 womens/7 men and they are too big!!!! Very unhappy with this as the sizing is different!!
customer_reviews.author: Corissa Fink

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. They are simple, classic, comfortable shoes that appear well made and which I wear regularly and show no significant wear after 60 days. Make of that what you will.
customer_reviews.author: Canyon Kip

product_meta.title: Vans Slip-on(tm) Core Classics Trainers
product_meta.description: The shoe that started it all. The iconic Vans Classic Slip-On keeps it simple and classic.
feature_bullets: Cotton drill lining provides breathability and extra comfort
